languages.text: {n}Эльдарка проводит по лицу рукой прежде, чем повернуться к вам. Бледная кожа плотно обтянула кости черепа, глаза утратили прежний блеск, а шея склонилась под тяжестью неведомого груза. И все же вы узнаете ее — это Ирлиэт Ланэвисс, некогда ваша спутница и причина заточения в этих темных стенах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдарка проводит по лицу рукой прежде, чем повернуться к вам. Бледная кожа плотно обтянула кости черепа, глаза утратили прежний блеск, а шея склонилась под тяжестью неведомого груза. И все же вы узнаете ее — это Ирлиэт Ланэвисс, некогда ваша спутница и причина заточения в этих темных стенах.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Aeldari runs a hand over her face before turning to you. Her pale skin is tightly stretched over the bones of her skull, her eyes have lost their glimmer, and her neck is stooped under an unseen burden. And yet you still recognise her, Yrliet Lanaevyss, your former companion and the reason for your imprisonment within these dark walls.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдарка проводит по лицу рукой прежде, чем повернуться к вам. Бледная кожа плотно обтянула кости черепа, глаза утратили прежний блеск, а шея склонилась под тяжестью неведомого груза. И все же вы узнаете ее — это Ирлиэт Ланэвисс, некогда ваша спутница и причина заточения в этих темных стенах.{/n}

And yet you still recognise her — Yrliet Lanaevyss, your former companion and the reason for your imprisonment in these dark walls.{/n}

And yet you still recognise her, Yrliet Lanaevyss, your former companion and the reason for your imprisonment within these dark walls.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アエルダリは顔を手で撫でてからあなたの方を向いた。彼女の青白い皮膚は頭蓋骨の骨にぴったりと張り付き、目は輝きを失い、首は見えない重荷のせいでこけている。それでもやはり、それが彼女、ユリエット・ラナエフィスであるということが分かる。かつての仲間であり、あなたがこの暗い壁の中に幽閉された理由でもある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari runs a hand over her face before turning to you. Her pale skin is tightly stretched over the bones of her skull, her eyes have lost their glimmer, and her neck is stooped under an unseen burden. And yet you still recognise her, Yrliet Lanaevyss, your former companion and the reason for your imprisonment within these dark walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリは顔を手で撫でてからあなたの方を向いた。彼女の青白い皮膚は頭蓋骨の骨にぴったりと張り付き、目は輝きを失い、首は見えない重荷のせいでこけている。それでもやはり、それが彼女、ユリエット・ラナエフィスであるということが分かる。かつての仲間であり、あなたがこの暗い壁の中に幽閉された理由でもある。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你眼前的艾达灵族用手捂住了脸，转向你。她苍白的皮肤紧绷着，双眼失去了光芒，脖子仿佛被看不见的重担压弯了。你认出了这个人是谁，她是伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝，你曾经的伙伴，正是她害得你被囚禁在这座黑暗的牢笼之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari runs a hand over her face before turning to you. Her pale skin is tightly stretched over the bones of her skull, her eyes have lost their glimmer, and her neck is stooped under an unseen burden. And yet you still recognise her, Yrliet Lanaevyss, your former companion and the reason for your imprisonment within these dark walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你眼前的艾达灵族用手捂住了脸，转向你。她苍白的皮肤紧绷着，双眼失去了光芒，脖子仿佛被看不见的重担压弯了。你认出了这个人是谁，她是伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝，你曾经的伙伴，正是她害得你被囚禁在这座黑暗的牢笼之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La Aeldari se pasa una mano por el rostro antes de girarse hacia ti. Su piel pálida está muy tensa alrededor de su cráneo, sus ojos han perdido todo su brillo y su cuello está encorvado como si soportara un peso invisible. Aun así, reconoces a Yrliet Lanaevyss, tu antigua compañera y la responsable de tu encierro entre estos muros oscuros.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari runs a hand over her face before turning to you. Her pale skin is tightly stretched over the bones of her skull, her eyes have lost their glimmer, and her neck is stooped under an unseen burden. And yet you still recognise her, Yrliet Lanaevyss, your former companion and the reason for your imprisonment within these dark walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La Aeldari se pasa una mano por el rostro antes de girarse hacia ti. Su piel pálida está muy tensa alrededor de su cráneo, sus ojos han perdido todo su brillo y su cuello está inclinado como si soportara un peso invisible. Aun así, reconoces a Yrliet Lanaevyss, tu antigua compañera y la responsable de tu encierro entre estos muros oscuros.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Aeldari fährt sich mit der Hand übers Gesicht, ehe sie sich zu dir wendet. Ihre fahle Haut ist eng über die Knochen ihres Schädels gespannt, ihre Augen haben ihren Glanz verloren, und ihre Schultern sind von einer unsichtbaren Last gebeugt. Und doch erkennst du sie, Yrliet Lanaevyss, deine ehemalige Gefährtin und der Grund, warum du in diesen dunklen Mauern eingesperrt bist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari runs a hand over her face before turning to you. Her pale skin is tightly stretched over the bones of her skull, her eyes have lost their glimmer, and her neck is stooped under an unseen burden. And yet you still recognise her, Yrliet Lanaevyss, your former companion and the reason for your imprisonment within these dark walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Aeldari fährt sich mit der Hand übers Gesicht, ehe sie sich zu dir wendet. Ihre fahle Haut ist eng über die Knochen ihres Schädels gespannt, ihre Augen haben ihren Glanz verloren, und ihre Schultern sind bucklig von einer unsichtbaren Last. Und doch erkennst du sie, Yrliet Lanaevyss, deine ehemalige Gefährtin und der Grund, warum du in diesen dunklen Wänden eingesperrt bist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'Aeldari se frotte le visage avant de se tourner vers vous. Malgré sa peau pâle tendue à l'extrême sur les os de son visage, ses yeux dénués de tout éclat et son cou courbé sous le poids d'un fardeau invisible, vous reconnaissez Yrliet Lanaevyss, votre ancienne camarade et la raison pour laquelle vous êtes {mf|enfermé|enfermée} entre ces murs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari runs a hand over her face before turning to you. Her pale skin is tightly stretched over the bones of her skull, her eyes have lost their glimmer, and her neck is stooped under an unseen burden. And yet you still recognise her, Yrliet Lanaevyss, your former companion and the reason for your imprisonment within these dark walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Aeldari se frotte le visage avant de se tourner vers vous. Malgré sa peau pâle tendue à l'extrême sur les os de son visage, ses yeux dénués de tout éclat et son cou courbé sous le poids d'un fardeau invisible, vous reconnaissez Yrliet Lanaevyss, votre ancien compagnon et la raison pour laquelle vous êtes {mf|enfermé|enfermée} entre ces murs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aeldari, elini yüzünde gezdirip sana dönüyor. Solgun teni, kafatasının üzerinde sıkıca gerilmiş. Gözlerindeki parıltı kaybolmuş. Gözle görülmeyen bir yükten de boynu bükülmüş. Bu kara duvarların arasında hapsolmana yol açan eski yoldaşın Yrliet Lanaevyss'i tüm bunlara rağmen tanıyabiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari runs a hand over her face before turning to you. Her pale skin is tightly stretched over the bones of her skull, her eyes have lost their glimmer, and her neck is stooped under an unseen burden. And yet you still recognise her, Yrliet Lanaevyss, your former companion and the reason for your imprisonment within these dark walls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari sana dönmeden önce elini yüzünde gezdiriyor. Solgun teni, kafatasının üzerinde sıkıca gerilmiş. Gözlerindeki parıltı yerinde değil. Gözle görülmeyen bir yükten de boynu bükülmüş. Bu kara duvarların arasında hapsolmana yol açan eski yoldaşın Yrliet Lanaevyss'i tüm bunlara rağmen tanıyabiliyorsun.{/n}
